page.title: 10School Games in Lostock 2
page.content:
Sometimes when our class are not playing cricket or rounders we get together and play a game called{Rover. It's a really good game - here are the rules.
First of all you get an even number of people and choose two teams. After that one of the teams link arms and call over one person from the other team saying{"Rover, Rover send 'named {person' over".}So the person who has been called runs from one end of the play-ground to the other team's linked arms and tries to break through. If he or she does break through they take back one of the opposite team. If they don't get through they stay on the linked arms team and the other team then start again by saying {"Rover, Rover send 'named person' {over".
